attributes.action: Post-infection immunity to SARS-CoV-2 should be equal to being fully vaccinated
attributes.additional_details: People with post-infection natural immunity to SARS-CoV-2 should have equal status to those fully vaccinated against Covid-19.
attributes.background:
UK Government should recognise existing science.
Post-infection natural immunity to SARS-CoV-2 is effective and long-lasting. Here is the scientific proof, along with explanation from Dr. John Campbell:
https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-021-03647-4
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mzOf6Cj3T-8

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you may like to sign:

Recognise immune response to Covid-19 in the Covid pass
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600576
